page.title: 06Greenheath Road Post Office
page.content: Mr. and Mrs. Lawrence have owned the local shop which is also a post office for seven years . Before that they had a mobile shop. They enjoy working in the shop but say that it is difficult to have a holiday together and they have to work very long hours. If one of them is ill it can make things very difficult . As well as selling stamps, the post office pays Child Benefit and Pensions, sells National Savings Certificates,Gift Tokens and Premium Bonds,performs Girobank and National Savings Bank transactions, accepts payments for Telephone Bills and Water Rates. Mr Lawrence looks after the post office and Mrs Lawrence looks after the shop which sells sweets,cakes,groceries and is also an off-lience selling beer, wine and spirits . The shop has been there for 60 years, it has 200 customers a day.
